meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lasting.
meanings.sent1: The lastingness of the friendship between the two girls was evident in their daily conversations.
meanings.sent2: The lastingness of the paint on the walls ensured that the house looked fresh for years.
meanings.sent3: The lastingness of the joke made everyone in the room burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The lastingness of the impact of his words lingered in her mind long after he had left.
meanings.sent5: The lastingness of the memory brought a smile to her face whenever she thought about it.

meanings.definition: The ability to endure or continue for a long time.
meanings.sent1: The lastingness of the old tree in the backyard amazed the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The lastingness of the battery life in the new phone impressed the users.
meanings.sent3: The lastingness of the student's focus during the lecture surprised the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The lastingness of the melody in the song captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The lastingness of the tradition brought comfort to the community during difficult times.
